      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected ShadowVar AccessEvent.originalShadow
      The ShadowVar (aka shadow location) for the accessed location, right before the access is performed.

      ShadowVar AccessEvent.getOriginalShadow()
      Returns the state field, right before event was dispatched.

      Gets the state of the shadow location corresponding to the accessed array element.
